price: Na wengi wa watu si wenye kuamini hata ukijitahidi.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Na wapo wengi ambao tabia zao zina maradhi zinazo wazuia wasisadiki haya unayo funuliwa, hata moyo wako ukiwa una shauku namna gani waamini, au nafsi yako ikafanya juhudi gani waongoke.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
